official_title: A bill to amend section 122 of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to permit local educational agencies to use funds under title I of the Act for educationally deprived children at schools which, although not otherwise eligible for funds under such title, have in attendance a significant number of educationally deprived children recently transferred to those schools because of school closings.

summary.text: Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to permit local educational agencies to use funds under title I (Financial Assistance to Meet Special Educational Needs of Children) of such Act for educationally deprived children at schools which, although not otherwise eligible for such funds, have in attendance a significant number of such children recently transferred to those schools because of school closings.
